sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {error} from 'protractor'; import {ReservationService} from '../../../Services/reservation.service'; import {Etat, Reservation} from '../../../Models/reservation.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sessions', templateUrl: './sessions.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sessions.component.css'] }) export class SessionsComponent implements OnInit { public reservations: Array = []; dateR: Date = new Date(); constructor(private reservationService: ReservationService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.loadAppointments(); } // tslint:disable-next-line:typedef loadAppointments() { this.reservationService.getReservation().subscribe( data => { this.reservations = data; }, // tslint:disable-next-line:no-shadowed-variable error => { console.error('Error fetching appointments', error); } ); } // tslint:disable-next-line:typedef confirmReservation(reservation: Reservation) { reservation.statusR = Etat.Confirmé; // Update the status to confirmed this.reservationService.updateReservationStatus(reservation).subscribe( updatedReservation => { this.loadAppointments(); }, error => { console.error('Error confirming reservation', error); // Handle error, such as showing an error message to the user } ); } // tslint:disable-next-line:typedef cancelReservation(reservation: Reservation) { reservation.statusR = Etat.Annulé; // Update the status to cancelled this.reservationService.updateReservationStatus(reservation).subscribe( updatedReservation => { this.loadAppointments(); }, error => { console.error('Error cancelling reservation', error); // Handle error } ); } }
